name: Send emails to WIld Apricot customers obtained via Airtable
description: When a new form is submitted in Airtable, Make will check whether the submitter's e-mail address already exists in Wild Apricot account. If it does, the contact is updated and an e-mail to the customer is sent. If the e-mail doesn't exist yet, a new contact is created and an e-mail for new customers is sent to their e-mail.
